question: what is onboarding process
answer: The onboarding process is a set of activities and steps that new team members go through when they join a team. At SmartAudit AI, the onboarding process includes gaining access to GitHub, cloning the repository, setting up Slack and Notion, and having an introductory call with the CTO. The goal of the onboarding process is to help new team members get up to speed and become productive members of the team as quickly as possible.
